description: The SanDisk SDAMX4-TC-G68 Sansa e200 Series 5-Piece Travel Case Kit helps protect and carry your Sansa e200 Series MP3 Player, while also keeping your accessories safe and accessible in one place. Great for traveling or storage, this kit includes a high-impact carrying case with belt loop, form-fitted foam protected insert for your player, leather glove, cleaning cloth, anti-scratch screen, lanyard and a pocket for additional accessories.What's in the BoxCarrying case, leather glove, cleaning cloth, anti-scratch screen and lanyard.
title: SanDisk Sansa e200 Series 5-Piece Travel Case Kit
